{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/init/start","mode":755,"uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"#!/bin/bash
set -eo pipefail
shopt -s nullglob
if [ -f %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/init/MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD ]; then 
  . %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/init/MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
fi
# if command starts with an option, prepend mysqld
if [ "${1:0:1}" = '-' ]; then
	set -- mysqld "$@"
fi

# skip setup if they want an option that stops mysqld
wantHelp=
for arg; do
	case "$arg" in
		-'?'|--help|--print-defaults|-V|--version)
			wantHelp=1
			break
			;;
	esac
done

# usage: file_env VAR [DEFAULT]
#    ie: file_env 'XYZ_DB_PASSWORD' 'example'
# (will allow for "$XYZ_DB_PASSWORD_FILE" to fill in the value of
#  "$XYZ_DB_PASSWORD" from a file, especially for Docker's secrets feature)
file_env() {
	local var="$1"
	local fileVar="${var}_FILE"
	local def="${2:-}"
	if [ "${!var:-}" ] && [ "${!fileVar:-}" ]; then
		echo >&2 "error: both $var and $fileVar are set (but are exclusive)"
		exit 1
	fi
	local val="$def"
	if [ "${!var:-}" ]; then
		val="${!var}"
	elif [ "${!fileVar:-}" ]; then
		val="$(< "${!fileVar}")"
	fi
	export "$var"="$val"
	unset "$fileVar"
}

_check_config() {
	toRun=( "$@" --verbose --help --log-bin-index="$(mktemp -u)" )
	if ! errors="$("${toRun[@]}" 2>&1 >/dev/null)"; then
		cat >&2 <<-EOM

			ERROR: mysqld failed while attempting to check config
			command was: "${toRun[*]}"

			$errors
		EOM
		exit 1
	fi
}

_datadir() {
	"$@" --verbose --help --log-bin-index="$(mktemp -u)" 2>/dev/null | awk '$1 == "datadir" { print $2; exit }'
}

# allow the container to be started with `--user`
if [ "$1" = 'mysqld' -a -z "$wantHelp" -a "$(id -u)" = '0' ]; then
	_check_config "$@"
	DATADIR="%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/data"
	chown -R mysql:mysql "%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/data"

fi

if [ "$1" = 'mysqld' -a -z "$wantHelp" ]; then
	# still need to check config, container may have started with --user
	_check_config "$@"
	# Get config
	DATADIR="%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/data"

	if [ ! -d "$DATADIR/mysql" ]; then
		file_env 'MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD'
		if [ -z "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD" -a -z "$MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD" -a -z "$MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD" ]; then
			echo >&2 'error: database is uninitialized and password option is not specified '
			echo >&2 '  You need to specify one of MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD, MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD and MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD'
			exit 1
		fi

		mkdir -p "$DATADIR"

		echo 'Initializing database'
		mysql_install_db --defaults-file="$DATADIR/../etc/mysql/my.cnf" --datadir="$DATADIR" --rpm
		echo 'Database initialized'

		 "$@" --datadir="$DATADIR" --socket="$DATADIR/.system/mysqld.sock" &
		pid="$!"

		mysql=( mysql --protocol=socket -uroot -hlocalhost --socket="$DATADIR/.system/mysqld.sock" )

		for i in {30..0}; do
			if echo 'SELECT 1' | mysql --protocol=socket -uroot -hlocalhost --socket="$DATADIR/.system/mysqld.sock" &> /dev/null; then
				break
			fi
			echo 'MySQL init process in progress...'
			sleep 1
		done
		if [ "$i" = 0 ]; then
			echo >&2 'MySQL init process failed.'
			exit 1
		fi

	
		if [ ! -z "$MYSQL_RANDOM_ROOT_PASSWORD" ]; then
			export MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD="$(pwgen -1 32)"
			echo "GENERATED ROOT PASSWORD: $MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"
		fi
		"${mysql[@]}" <<-EOSQL
			-- What's done in this file shouldn't be replicated
			--  or products like mysql-fabric won't work
			SET @@SESSION.SQL_LOG_BIN=0;

			DELETE FROM mysql.user ;
			CREATE USER 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}' ;
			GRANT ALL ON *.* TO 'root'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION ;
			DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS test ;
			FLUSH PRIVILEGES ;
		EOSQL

		if [ ! -z "$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD" ]; then
			mysql+=( -p"${MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}" )
		fi

		file_env 'MYSQL_DATABASE'
		if [ "$MYSQL_DATABASE" ]; then
			echo "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS \`$MYSQL_DATABASE\` ;" | "${mysql[@]}"
			mysql+=( "$MYSQL_DATABASE" )
		fi

		file_env 'MYSQL_USER'
		file_env 'MYSQL_PASSWORD'
		if [ "$MYSQL_USER" -a "$MYSQL_PASSWORD" ]; then
			echo "CREATE USER '$MYSQL_USER'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '$MYSQL_PASSWORD' ;" | "${mysql[@]}"

			if [ "$MYSQL_DATABASE" ]; then
				echo "GRANT ALL ON \`$MYSQL_DATABASE\`.* TO '$MYSQL_USER'@'%' ;" | "${mysql[@]}"
			fi

			echo 'FLUSH PRIVILEGES ;' | "${mysql[@]}"
		fi

		echo
		for f in /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/*; do
			case "$f" in
				*.sh)     echo "$0: running $f"; . "$f" ;;
				*.sql)    echo "$0: running $f"; "${mysql[@]}" < "$f"; echo ;;
				*.sql.gz) echo "$0: running $f"; gunzip -c "$f" | "${mysql[@]}"; echo ;;
				*)        echo "$0: ignoring $f" ;;
			esac
			echo
		done

		if ! kill -s TERM "$pid" || ! wait "$pid"; then
			echo >&2 'MySQL init process failed.'
			exit 1
		fi

		echo
		echo 'MySQL init process done. Ready for start up.'
		echo
	fi
fi

exec "$@" --datadir="$DATADIR" --socket="$DATADIR/.system/mysqld.sock" & "}

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/init/dbjobs_new","mode":755,"uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"#!/bin/bash
set -x
USER=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MYSQL_ROOT_USER%%
PASSWORD=$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
MYSQL_PORT=%%ENV:SERVER_PORT%%
MYSQL_SERVER=%%ENV:SERVER_HOST%%
CLUSTER_NAME=%%ENV:SVC_NAMESPACE%%
REPLICATION_MANAGER_ADDR=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_REPLICATION_MANAGER_ADDR%%
MYSQL_CONF=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MYSQL_CONFDIR%%
DATADIR=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MYSQL_DATADIR%%
MYSQL_CLIENT=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/mysql
MYSQL_CHECK=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/mysqlcheck
MYSQL_DUMP=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/mysqldump
SST_RECEIVER_PORT=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_SST_RECEIVER_PORT%%
SOCAT_BIND=%%ENV:SERVER_IP%%
MARIADB_BACKUP=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/mariabackup
XTRABACKUP=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/xtrabackup
INNODBACKUPEX=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_CLIENT_BASEDIR%%/innobackupex

ERROLOG=$DATADIR/.system/logs/error.log
SLOWLOG=$DATADIR/.system/logs/slow-query.log
BACKUPDIR=$DATADIR/.system/backup

JOBS=( "xtrabackup" "mariabackup" "error" "slowquery" "zfssnapback" "optimize" "reseedxtrabackup" "reseedmariabackup" "reseedmysqldump" "flashbackxtrabackup" "flashbackmariadbackup" "flashbackmysqldump" "stop" "restart" "start")

# OSX need socat extra path
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin
 
socatCleaner()
{
 kill -9 $(lsof -t -i:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT -sTCP:LISTEN)
}

doneJob()
{
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf -e "set sql_log_bin=0;UPDATE replication_manager_schema.jobs set end=NOW(), result=LOAD_FILE('/tmp/dbjob.out') WHERE id='$ID';" &
}

pauseJob()
{
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf -e "select sleep(20);set sql_log_bin=0;UPDATE replication_manager_schema.jobs set done=1,result=LOAD_FILE('/tmp/dbjob.out') WHERE id='$ID';" &
}

slaveReady()
{
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf -e "set sql_log_bin=0;UPDATE replication_manager_schema.jobs set result='ready' WHERE id='$ID';" &
}

partialRestore()
{
 chown -R mysql:mysql $BACKUPDIR
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;install plugin BLACKHOLE soname 'ha_blackhole.so'"
 for dir in $(ls -d $BACKUPDIR/*/ | xargs -n 1 basename | grep -vE 'mysql|performance_schema|replication_manager_schema') ; do
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;drop database IF EXISTS $dir; CREATE DATABASE $dir;"


  for file in $(find $BACKUPDIR/$dir/ -name "*.exp" | xargs -n 1 basename | cut -d'.' --complement -f2-) ; do
   cat $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.frm | sed -e 's/\x06\x00\x49\x6E\x6E\x6F\x44\x42\x00\x00\x00/\x09\x00\x42\x4C\x41\x43\x4B\x48\x4F\x4C\x45/g' > $DATADIR/$dir/mrm_pivo.frm
   chown mysql:mysql $DATADIR/$dir/mrm_pivo.frm
   $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;ALTER TABLE $dir.mrm_pivo  engine=innodb;RENAME TABLE $dir.mrm_pivo TO $dir.$file; ALTER TABLE $dir.$file DISCARD TABLESPACE;"
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.ibd $DATADIR/$dir/$file.ibd
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.exp $DATADIR/$dir/$file.exp
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.cfg $DATADIR/$dir/$file.cfg
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.TRG $DATADIR/$dir/$file.TRG
   $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;ALTER TABLE $dir.$file IMPORT TABLESPACE"
  done
  for file in $(find $BACKUPDIR/$dir/ -name "*.MYD" | xargs -n 1 basename | cut -d'.' --complement -f2-) ; do
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.* $DATADIR/$dir/
   $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;FLUSH TABLE $dir.$file"
  done
  for file in $(find $BACKUPDIR/$dir/ -name "*.CSV" | xargs -n 1 basename | cut -d'.' --complement -f2-) ; do
   mv $BACKUPDIR/$dir/$file.* $DATADIR/$dir/
   $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;FLUSH TABLE $dir.$file"
  done
 done
 for file in $(find $BACKUPDIR/mysql/ -name "*.MYD" | xargs -n 1 basename | cut -d'.' --complement -f2-) ; do
   mv $BACKUPDIR/mysql/$file.* $DATADIR/mysql/
   $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;FLUSH TABLE mysql.$file"
 done
 cat $BACKUPDIR/xtrabackup_info | grep binlog_pos | awk  -F, '{ print $3 }' | sed -e 's/GTID of the last change/set sql_log_bin=0;set global gtid_slave_pos=/g' | $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf   -e"flush privileges;start slave;"
}

for job in "${JOBS[@]}"
do

 TASK=($(echo "select concat(id,'@',server,':',port) from replication_manager_schema.jobs WHERE task='$job' and done=0 order by task desc limit 1" | $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf -N))

 ADDRESS=($(echo $TASK | awk -F@ '{ print $2 }'))
 ID=($(echo $TASK | awk -F@ '{ print $1 }'))
 #purge de past
 $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  -e "set sql_log_bin=0;UPDATE replication_manager_schema.jobs set done=1 WHERE done=0 AND task='$job' AND ID<>$ID;"

  if [ "$ADDRESS" == "" ]; then
    echo "No $job needed"
    case "$job" in 
    start)
       if [ "curl -so /dev/null -w '%{response_code}'   http://$REPLICATION_MANAGER_ADDR/api/clusters/$CLUSTER_NAME/servers/$MYSQL_SERVER/$MYSQL_PORT/need-start" == "200" ]; then
          curl http://$REPLICATION_MANAGER_ADDR/api/clusters/$CLUSTER_NAME/servers/$MYSQL_SERVER/$MYSQL_PORT/config|tar xzvf etc/* - -C $CONFDIR/../..
    systemctl start mysql 
       fi
    ;;
   esac
  else
    echo "Processing $job"
    case "$job" in
      reseedmysqldump)
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner
       time socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | gunzip | $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf --init-command="reset master;set sql_log_bin=0;" > /tmp/dbjob.out 2>&1
        slaveReady
      ;;
      flashbackmysqldump)
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner
       socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | gunzip | $MYSQL_CLIENT --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf --init-command="set sql_log_bin=0" > /tmp/dbjob.out 2>&1
        slaveReady
      ;;
      reseedxtrabackup)
       rm -rf $BACKUPDIR
       mkdir $BACKUPDIR
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner
       socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | xbstream -x -C $BACKUPDIR
       $XTRABACKUP --prepare --export --target-dir=$BACKUPDIR
       partialRestore
      ;;
      reseedmariabackup)
       rm -rf $BACKUPDIR
       mkdir $BACKUPDIR
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner
       socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | mbstream -x -C $BACKUPDIR
       # mbstream -p, --parallel
       $MARIADB_BACKUP --prepare --export --target-dir=$BACKUPDIR
       partialRestore
      ;;
      flashbackxtrabackup)
       rm -rf $BACKUPDIR
       mkdir $BACKUPDIR
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner 
       socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | xbstream -x -C $BACKUPDIR
       $XTRABACKUP --prepare --export --target-dir=$BACKUPDIR
       partialRestore
      ;;
      flashbackmariadbackup)
       rm -rf $BACKUPDIR
       mkdir $BACKUPDIR
       echo "Waiting backup." >  /tmp/dbjob.out
       pauseJob
       socatCleaner
       socat -u TCP-LISTEN:$SST_RECEIVER_PORT,reuseaddr,bind=$SOCAT_BIND STDOUT | xbstream -x -C $BACKUPDIR
       $MARIADB_BACKUP --prepare --export --target-dir=$BACKUPDIR
       partialRestore
      ;;
      xtrabackup)
       cd /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
       $INNODBACKUPEX  --defaults-file=$MYSQL_CONF/my.cnf --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  --no-version-check  --stream=xbstream /tmp/ | socat -u stdio TCP:$ADDRESS &>/tmp/dbjob.out
      ;;
      mariabackup)
       cd /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
       $MARIADB_BACKUP --innobackupex --defaults-file=$MYSQL_CONF/my.cnf --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf  --no-version-check --stream=xbstream /tmp/ | socat -u stdio TCP:$ADDRESS &>/tmp/dbjob.out
      ;;
      error)
       cat $ERROLOG| socat -u stdio TCP:$ADDRESS &>/tmp/dbjob.out
       > $ERROLOG
      ;;
      slowquery)
       cat $SLOWLOG| socat -u stdio TCP:$ADDRESS &>/tmp/dbjob.out
       > $SLOWLOG
      ;;
      zfssnapback)
       LASTSNAP=`zfs list -r -t all |grep zp%%ENV:SERVICES_SVCNAME%%_pod01 | grep daily | sort -r | head -n 1  | cut -d" " -f1`
       %%ENV:SERVICES_SVCNAME%% stop
       zfs rollback $LASTSNAP
       %%ENV:SERVICES_SVCNAME%% start
      ;;
      optimize)
       $MYSQL_CHECK -o --defaults-extra-file=$MYSQL_CONF/dbjob.cnf --all-databases --skip-write-binlog &>/tmp/dbjob.out
      ;;
      restart)
       systemctl restart mysql  
       journalctl -u mysql > /tmp/dbjob.out 
      ;;
      stop)
       systemctl stop mysql 
       journalctl -u mysql > /tmp/dbjob.out 
      ;;
  esac
  doneJob
  fi

done
"}

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/with_rep_wsrep.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"[mysqld]
bind-address=%%ENV:SERVER_IP%%
binlog_format = ROW
log_bin = ON

[galera]
##
## WSREP options
##
wsrep_on=ON

# Full path to wsrep provider library or 'none'
wsrep_provider=/usr/lib/libgalera_smm.so

wsrep_node_address=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_WSREP_NODE_ADDRESS%%

# Provider specific configuration options
wsrep_provider_options="gcache.size=128M; gmcast.segment=0"

# Logical cluster name. Should be the same for all nodes.
wsrep_cluster_name="mariadb_poc_cluster"

# Group communication system handle
wsrep_cluster_address=gcomm://%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_GCOMM%%


# Human_readable node name (non-unique). Hostname by default.
#wsrep_node_name=

# Address for incoming client connections. Autodetect by default.
wsrep_node_incoming_address=%%ENV:SERVER_IP%%:%%ENV:SERVER_PORT%%

# How many threads will process writesets from other nodes
wsrep_slave_threads=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MAX_CORES%%

# DBUG options for wsrep provider
#wsrep_dbug_option

# Generate fake primary keys for non-PK tables (required for multi-master
# and parallel applying   svar  operation)
wsrep_certify_nonPK=1



# Maximum number of rows in write set
wsrep_max_ws_rows=131072

# Maximum size of write set
wsrep_max_ws_size=1073741824

# to enable debug level logging, set this to 1
wsrep_debug=0

# convert locking sessions into transactions
wsrep_convert_LOCK_to_trx=0

# how many times to retry deadlocked autocommits
wsrep_retry_autocommit=10

# change auto_increment_increment and auto_increment_offset automatically
wsrep_auto_increment_control=0

# replicate myisam
loose_wsrep_replicate_myisam=1
# retry autoinc insert, which failed for duplicate key error
loose_wsrep_drupal_282555_workaround=1

# enable "strictly synchronous" semantics for read operations
#wsrep_causal_reads=0
loose_wsrep_causal_reads=1

# Command to call when node status or cluster membership changes.
# Will be passed all or some of the following options:
# --status  - new status of this node
# --uuid    - UUID of the cluster
# --primary - whether the component is primary or not ("yes"/"no")
# --members - comma-separated list of members
# --index   - index of this node in the list
#wsrep_notify_cmd=

##
## WSREP State Transfer options
##
# State Snapshot Transfer method


#wsrep_sst_donor= 

wsrep_sst_method=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_SST_METHOD%%
wsrep_sst_auth=root:%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD%%

# wsrep_sst_receive_address=%%ENV:SERVER_IP%%
# Location of the directory with data files. Needed for non-mysqldump
# state snapshot transfers. Defaults to mysql_real_data_home.
wsrep_data_home_dir=/var/lib/mysql


wsrep_provider_options="evs.keepalive_period = PT2S; evs.inactive_check_period = PT10S; evs.suspect_timeout = PT15S; evs.inactive_timeout = PT30S; evs.send_window = 64; evs.user_send_window = 32; evs.install_timeout = PT15S; pc.wait_prim=yes"

[xtrabackup]
parallel=4
"}

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/engine_spider.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"# mariadb_command: INSTALL SONAME 'ha_spider';SET GLOBAL innodb_large_prefix = 1;SET GLOBAL spider_same_server_link=1;SET GLOBAL spider_auto_increment_mode=1;SET GLOBAL spider_semi_table_lock  = 0;SET GLOBAL spider_support_xa=0;SET GLOBAL spider_direct_dup_insert = 1;SET GLOBAL spider_remote_sql_log_off=1;SET GLOBAL spider_casual_read=0;SET GLOBAL spider_bka_mode = 0;SET GLOBAL spider_quick_mode=3 ;SET GLOBAL spider_quick_page_size=1000;SET GLOBAL spider_sync_trx_isolation=1;SET GLOBAL spider_sync_autocommit=1;SET GLOBAL spider_sts_sync=1;SET GLOBAL spider_sts_bg_mode=0;SET GLOBAL spider_sts_mode=1 ;SET GLOBAL spider_sts_interval=10;SET GLOBAL spider_store_last_sts=1;SET GLOBAL spider_reset_sql_alloc=1;SET GLOBAL spider_bgs_mode=0;SET GLOBAL spider_use_pushdown_udf=0;SET GLOBAL spider_crd_mode=1;SET GLOBAL spider_crd_sync=1;SET GLOBAL spider_crd_bg_mode=0;SET GLOBAL spider_crd_interval=10;SET GLOBAL spider_store_last_crd=1;SET GLOBAL spider_connect_mutex = 0;SET GLOBAL spider_conn_recycle_mode=0;SET GLOBAL spider_conn_recycle_strict = 0;SET GLOBAL spider_local_lock_table=0;SET GLOBAL spider_connect_retry_count = 10;SET GLOBAL spider_connect_retry_interval = 1000 ;SET GLOBAL spider_partition_skip_pk_sort_for_non_clustered_pk_table=1;

[mariadb]
# plugin_load_add=ha_spider.so

[mariadb 10.4]
innodb_large_prefix = 1
[mysqld]
loose_spider_same_server_link=1
loose_spider_auto_increment_mode=1
loose_spider_semi_table_lock  = 0
loose_spider_support_xa=0
loose_spider_direct_dup_insert = 1
loose_spider_remote_sql_log_off=1
loose_spider_casual_read=0
loose_spider_bka_mode = 0
loose_spider_quick_mode=3 
loose_spider_quick_page_size=1000
loose_spider_sync_trx_isolation=1
loose_spider_sync_autocommit=1

loose_spider_sts_sync=1
loose_spider_sts_bg_mode=0
loose_spider_sts_mode=1 
loose_spider_sts_interval=10
loose_spider_store_last_sts=1
#show table  


loose_spider_reset_sql_alloc=1
loose_spider_bgs_mode=0
loose_spider_use_pushdown_udf=0

loose_spider_crd_mode=1
loose_spider_crd_sync=1
loose_spider_crd_bg_mode=0
loose_spider_crd_interval=10
loose_spider_store_last_crd=1
loose_spider_connect_mutex = 0

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/default_security.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"# SECURITY

# mysql_command: SET GLOBAL max_prepared_stmt_count=200000;SET GLOBAL optimizer_search_depth = 0;SET GLOBAL join_cache_level = 6;SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='extended_keys=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='index_condition_pushdown=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='engine_condition_pushdown=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='derived_merge=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='derived_with_keys=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='firstmatch=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='loosescan=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='materialization=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='in_to_exists=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='semijoin=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='partial_match_rowid_merge=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='partial_match_table_scan=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='subquery_cache=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='mrr=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='mrr_cost_based=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='mrr_sort_keys=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='outer_join_with_cache=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='semijoin_with_cache=off';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='join_cache_incremental=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='join_cache_hashed=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='join_cache_bka=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='optimize_join_buffer_size=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch ='table_elimination=on';SET GLOBAL eq_range_index_dive_limit=10;SET GLOBAL in_predicate_conversion_threshold=1000;SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch='orderby_uses_equalities=on';SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch='use_index_extensions=off'; SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch='duplicateweedout=on'; SET GLOBAL optimizer_switch=’rowid_filter=off’;

[mysqld]
loose_optimizer_switch='use_index_extensions=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='index_condition_pushdown=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='engine_condition_pushdown=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='derived_merge=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='mrr=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='mrr_cost_based=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='firstmatch=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='loosescan=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='semijoin=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='duplicateweedout=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='materialization=on'

[mariadb]
loose_optimizer_search_depth = 0
loose_join_cache_level = 6
loose_optimizer_switch ='extended_keys=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='derived_with_keys=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='in_to_exists=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='partial_match_rowid_merge=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='partial_match_table_scan=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='subquery_cache=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='mrr_sort_keys=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='outer_join_with_cache=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='semijoin_with_cache=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='join_cache_incremental=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='join_cache_hashed=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='join_cache_bka=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='optimize_join_buffer_size=on'
loose_optimizer_switch ='table_elimination=on'
#10.1.16
loose_optimizer_switch='orderby_uses_equalities=on'
# 10.3.18, 10.4.8
loose_optimizer_switch ='in_predicate_conversion=on'
loose_eq_range_index_dive_limit=10


# 10.6
loose_optimizer_switch ='not_null_range_scan=off'
loose_optimizer_switch ='cost_based_order_by_limit=on'

# 10.4
loose_max_prepared_stmt_count=200000

loose_optimizer_switch=’rowid_filter=off’
loose_optimizer_use_condition_selectivity = 1

#MDEV-32064
loose_in_predicate_conversion_threshold = 10000

loose_analyze_sample_percentage = 25 "}

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/engine_innodb.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"# INNODB
# ------
# mariadb_command: SET GLOBAL innodb_adaptive_hash_index=0;SET GLOBAL innodb_buffer_pool_size = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MAX_MEM%%*1024*1024;SET GLOBAL innodb_io_capacity = %%ENV:CHECKPOINTIOPS%%;SET GLOBAL innodb_io_capacity_max = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MAX_IOPS%%;SET GLOBAL innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_MAX_DIRTY_PAGE_PCT%%;SET GLOBAL innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct_lwm = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_MAX_DIRTY_PAGE_PCT_LWM%%;SET GLOBAL innodb_flush_neighbors = 1;EXECUTE IMMEDIATE IF(@@innodb_buffer_pool_instances=%%ENV:IBPINSTANCES%%,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_buffer_pool_instances'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_buffer_pool_instances =%%ENV:IBPINSTANCES%%"); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE IF(@@innodb_read_io_threads=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_READ_IO_THREADS%%,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_read_io_threads'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_read_io_threads = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_READ_IO_THREADS%%");EXECUTE IMMEDIATE IF(@@innodb_write_io_threads=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_WRITE_IO_THREADS%%,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_write_io_threads'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_write_io_threads = %%ENV:ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_WRITE_IO_THREADS%%");EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_log_buffer_size=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_LOG_BUFFER_SIZE%%*1024*1024,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_log_buffer_size'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_log_buffer_size = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_LOG_BUFFER_SIZE%%*1024*1024");SET GLOBAL innodb_thread_concurrency = 0;EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_autoinc_lock_mode=2,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_autoinc_lock_mode'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_autoinc_lock_mode=2");SET GLOBAL innodb_stats_on_metadata = 0;SET GLOBAL innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown = 1;EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup=1,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup=1");EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_open_files=16384,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_open_files'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_open_files=16384");EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_purge_threads=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_PURGE_THREADS%%,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_purge_threads'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_purge_threads = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_PURGE_THREADS%%");SET GLOBAL innodb_concurrency_tickets = 5000;SET GLOBAL innodb_print_all_deadlocks = 1; EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_large_prefix=1 OR @@innodb_large_prefix IS NULL,"SELECT 'Unchanged innodb_large_prefix'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_large_prefix = 1"); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE  IF(@@innodb_file_format='barracuda' OR @@innodb_file_format IS NULL,"SELECT 'Unchanged barracuda'", "SET GLOBAL innodb_file_format='barracuda'");SET GLOBAL innodb_default_row_format=dynamic;
 
[mysqld-5.5]
innodb_file_format = barracuda
[mysqld-5.6]
innodb_file_format = barracuda
[mysqld-5.7]
innodb_file_format = barracuda 
#deprecated in 5.8

[mariadb]
#innodb_buffer_pool_populate=0 
[mariadb 5.5]
innodb_file_format = barracuda
[mariadb 10.0]
innodb_file_format = barracuda
 
[mariadb 10.1]

innodb_file_format = barracuda

innodb_buffer_pool_instances = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_BUFFER_POOL_INSTANCES%%

loose_innodb_io_capacity = %%ENV:CHECKPOINTIOPS%%
loose_innodb_io_capacity_max = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_MAX_IOPS%%
loose_innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_MAX_DIRTY_PAGE_PCT%%
loose_innodb_max_dirty_pages_pct_lwm = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_MAX_DIRTY_PAGE_PCT_LWM%%
loose_innodb_log_file_size = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_LOG_FILE_SIZE%%M
# innodb_log_buffer_size change Crash 10.2.14
loose_innodb_log_buffer_size = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_LOG_BUFFER_SIZE%%M
loose_innodb_purge_threads = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_PURGE_THREADS%%
loose_innodb_lru_flush_size = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_INNODB_LRU_FLUSH_SIZE%%
loose_innodb_adaptive_hash_index = 0
loose_innodb_file_per_table= 1
loose_innodb_log_files_in_group = 1
loose_innodb_flush_neighbors = 1
innodb_thread_concurrency = 0
loose_innodb_flush_method = O_DIRECT
#loose_innodb_undo_tablespaces = 4
loose_innodb_autoinc_lock_mode = 2
loose_innodb_stats_on_metadata = 0
loose_innodb_buffer_pool_dump_at_shutdown = 1
loose_innodb_buffer_pool_load_at_startup = 1
loose_innodb_open_files = 16384
loose_innodb_concurrency_tickets = 5000
loose_innodb_print_all_deadlocks = 1

loose_innodb_force_primary_key = 1

[mariadb 10.4]

loose_innodb_file_format = barracuda
loose_innodb_default_row_format=dynamic
"}

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/with_disk_innodbpagecompression.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"# mariadb_version: 10.1.0

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/with_log_audit.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"### MariaDB Audit Plugin ###
# mariadb_command: INSTALL SONAME 'server_audit'; SET GLOBAL server_audit_events = 'CONNECT,QUERY,TABLE,QUERY_DDL,QUERY_DML_NO_SELECT';SET GLOBAL server_audit_logging = ON ;SET GLOBAL server_audit_output_type = SYSLOG;SET GLOBAL server_audit_query_log_limit = 1024;SET GLOBAL server_audit_syslog_facility = LOG_USER ;SET GLOBAL server_audit_syslog_ident = 'mysql-server_auditing';
# mariadb_default: SET GLOBAL server_audit_logging = 0;

[mysqld]
plugin_load_add ="server_audit.so"
loose_server_audit  = FORCE_PLUS_PERMANENT
loose_server_audit_events = CONNECT,QUERY,TABLE,QUERY_DDL,QUERY_DML_NO_SELECT
loose_server_audit_logging = ON
loose_server_audit_output_type = SYSLOG
loose_server_audit_query_log_limit = 1024

{"path":"%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_BASE_DIR%%/%%ENV:POD%%/etc/mysql/replication-manager.d/default_replication.cnf","mode":"%%ENV:CNF_PERMS%%","uid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_UID%%","gid":"%%ENV:MYSQL_GID%%","fmt":"# REPLICATION

# mysql_command: SET GLOBAL server_id=%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_SERVER_ID%%;SET GLOBAL relay_log_space_limit = 0;SET GLOBAL binlog_format = MIXED;SET GLOBAL binlog_checksum = 1;SET GLOBAL binlog_cache_size = 1*1024*1024;SET GLOBAL binlog_stmt_cache_size = 1*1024*1024;SET GLOBAL expire_logs_days = %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_EXPIRE_LOG_DAYS%%;SET GLOBAL sync_binlog = 1;SET GLOBAL report_host='host_%%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_SERVER_ID%%';SET GLOBAL log_slave_updates = ON;SET GLOBAL log_bin_trust_function_creators = ON;SET GLOBAL loose_binlog_row_query_log_events = 1;SET GLOBAL slave_type_conversions = 'ALL_NON_LOSSY';SET GLOBAL replicate_annotate_row_events = 1;SET GLOBAL binlog_annotate_row_events = 1;SET GLOBAL gtid_domain_id =  %%ENV:SVC_CONF_ENV_DOMAIN_ID%%;SET GLOBAL slave_parallel_mode = conservative;SET GLOBAL slave_domain_parallel_threads = %%ENV:NODES_CPU_CORES%%;SET GLOBAL slave_parallel_threads = %%ENV:NODES_CPU_CORES%%;SET GLOBAL slave_parallel_max_queued =2*1024*1024;

[mysqld]
